title: Microsoft will announce Windows 11 features for hybrid work on April 5th
content:
Microsoft is preparing a new event focused on Windows 11 features for hybrid work, which will take place on April 5th. The company hasn’t said much about what you can expect, aside from sharing a page that simply states “Windows powers the future of hybrid work”. There will be a keynote address by Panos Panay,

The post Microsoft will announce Windows 11 features for hybrid work on April 5th appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft has announced a new event on April 5th, where it will seemingly announce new Windows 11 features for the future of hybrid work.
